**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Yes, but recent versions of mPDF are not compatible with older PHP versions (5.3, 5.4, 5.5) (already pointed here #1285).

This will cause problems since we've always matched Joomla minimum requirement (https://downloads.joomla.org/technical-requirements) and there are current easySDI users with older PHP versions in production (ASIT, AGI, GVA, ...)
